General.Name: PetroVietnam General Services Corp
General.Description: PetroVietnam General Services Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in distribution, supply chain, catering, and property services businesses in Vietnam. The company operates through Electronic Products; Wholesale; and Other Services. It trades in plastic resins, textile fibers, fertilizers, pesticides, chemicals, computers and equipment, and telecommunication equipment; sells supplies, office equipment, and audio-visual equipment; provides support and management, and human resources services; and leases warehouse, workshops, premises, and offices. The company also develops, trades, and manages real estate properties, including office, hotels, residential projects, etc.; supplies specialized materials and equipment in the oil and gas industry; and provides heavy transportation and lifting, LPG trading and distribution, and gas filling services. In addition, it is involved in the distribution of equipment, electronics, components, peripheral devices, and software; retail of mobile phones; trading electronic devices, and refrigeration and electronic household appliances; wholesale of solid, liquid, and gaseous fuels; and the provision of packing services for paper products, hospitality, wastage treatment, and technology transfer and delivery services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
